title: shouldnt lose LP when there is an AFK
body: i just had a game where my midlaner kept disconnecting and connecting continuously until they finally disconnected and didnt come back. We would've almost definitely won that game, even though it was 4v5 i ended with a 14/6 KD and the top lane illaoi winning a lot of 1 v 2 fights. Obviously we lost that game in the end, but my point is why do we lose lp in games like that? there is almost no way to win or carry 4v5 games.
